text.craftgr.config.title: CraftGR Config
text.craftgr.config.option.volume.toolti: Playback Volume of the Gensokyo Radio music.
text.craftgr.config.option.overlayVisibi: Option for when the song overlay is visible.
text.craftgr.config.option.overlayPositi:
Option for where to display the
song info overlay at.
text.craftgr.config.option.openAlbum: Click Overlay to Open Album Info
text.craftgr.config.option.openAlbum.too:
Whether to open the album info webpage
or not when clicking the song overlay.
Whether to hide the album cover image
or not in the song info overlay.
text.craftgr.config.option.overlayBgColo:
Background color of the
song info overlay.
text.craftgr.config.option.overlayBarCol:
Progress bar color of the
song info overlay.
How wide the song info overlay
should be.
How large the song info overlay
should be displayed.
text.craftgr.config.option.urlStream.too:
URL to stream the audio from.
Only works with MP3 streams.
text.craftgr.config.option.urlInfoJson.t:
URL of the json API to get
the current song information.
text.craftgr.config.option.urlAlbumArt.t: Base URL to get the album images from.
